Solid growth in our core business and very strong growth in our emerging businesses drove 24% revenue growth year over year. We saw strength in every major product area, as more and more traditional brand advertisers embraced search advertising and as large advertisers increasingly ran integrated campaigns across search, display, and mobile. We feel confident about our future, and plan to continue to invest aggressively in our core areas of strategic focus. Q2 Financial Summary Google Inc. reported revenues of$ 6.82 billion for the quarter ended June 30, 2010, an increase of 24% compared to the second quarter of 2009. though.`` A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program,'' says an article on MSPmentor.net, which tracks the managed services provider market. MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers. of Evansville political science professor. If Mike Pence is to encounter any bumps at all, they could come early, as he shifts his focus from federal to state issues, Robert Dion said. In some cases, it can be an awkward transition, to go from being a lawmaker to an executive, and to go from the federal level to the state level. There's going to be that transition that might have a few hiccups to it, he said.`` But he's familiar with all the issues, he's an energetic campaigner, he's got solid conservative credentials, he knows how to raise money.''
